alert.note: Alert for Branch (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 1:56PM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Visibilities reduced to less than a quarter of a mile in heavier snow showers. Wind chills dropping into the single digits tonight. * WHERE...Branch County. * WHEN...Late this afternoon into tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery, snow covered roads. Areas of blowing snow and heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
